data.oai_dc:dc: Central Slovenian Scientific Collection of Siphonaptera includes 8,497 microscopic slides and some material preserved in ethanol. From 1950 until the present it is cura ted by Savo Brelih, recently with help of dr. Tomi Trilar. Collection is one of the largest from the Balkan Peninsula and representative for the overview of the flea (Siphonaptera) fauna of this area. In this dataset we give the data from Slovenia only.|2,877 occurrences
